Notes.Text:
This update for libass fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-36430: Fixed heap-based buffer overflow in decode_chars (bsc#1188539).

Vulnerabilities.Description: libass 0.15.x before 0.15.1 has a heap-based buffer overflow in decode_chars (called from decode_font and process_text) because the wrong integer data type is used for subtraction.
